Posts.Content: Yes, my breast cancer is attributed to Prempro, hormone replacement drug my Dr. Prescribed as onset of menopause. Suzanne Somers book suggested this replacement therapy. I got breast cancer, early detection, 5 Years on Arimidex. I have many side affects from Arimidex. Does anyone know the class action lawsuit attorney information? Very important to us all. Thanks
Posts.Title: Are you Estrogen positive Breast cancer and think you know what caused it?
